revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pikachu Valley |image = [[File:Pikachu Valley.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Pikachu Valley. |tokens = 850,000 |location = North of Route 4 }}
'''Pikachu Valley''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,952,804 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu|40}} ||rowspan=7 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | {{Pokemon|Pichu|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Plusle|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Minun|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Pachirisu|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Emolga|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Dedenne|40}} |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (Original Cap)|50}} ||rowspan=7|<center>59,764,020 || rowspan=7 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (Hoenn Cap)|50}} |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (Sinnoh Cap)|50}} |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (Unova Cap)|50}} |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (Kalos Cap)|50}} |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (Alola Cap)|50}}* |- | {{Pokemon|Pikachu (World Cap)|50}}* |} '''*Note:''' Pikachu (Alola Cap) and Pikachu (World Cap) require the player to be [[Gyms#Pokémon League Alola|Alola Champion]] and [[Gyms#Wyndon Stadium|Galar Champion]] respectively to unlock.
==Items== <tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 1 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Cheri}} || 1 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || 1 || 4.01% || 5.21% || 7.04% || 10.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Magnet}} || 1 || 1.00% || 1.59% || 2.50% || 4.03% |} </tab> </tabs>
